Primary outcome caesarean delivery rate . Secondary outcome Apgar score < 7 5 minute , need neonatal intensive care , hyper-stimulation contraction , spontaneous vaginal birth rate , length labour , postpartum haemorrhage , sphincter laceration , experience labour pain , epidural analgesia women´s childbirth experience one month postpartum ( assessed Childbirth Experience Questionnaire ) . DOC.brief_title: High Dose Versus Low Dose Oxytocin Augmentation Delayed Labour
DOC.detailed_description: The aim compare start dose increment amount oxytocin augmentation delay labour determine whether augmentation high dose oxytocin improve labour outcome compare low dose oxytocin , without effect neonatal outcome birth experience negatively . Delay labour , also describe poor progress , due ineffective uterine contraction major problem modern obstetric care one main reason increase rate caesarean delivery , particular among nulliparous woman . Infusion synthetic oxytocin commonly use treatment hypotonic uterine contraction . Despite widespread use oxytocin consensus exist regard dosage oxytocin , start dose increment amount oxytocin . In randomized control trial conduct three hospital southwest Sweden , consent nulliparous woman active phase labour define delayed labour progress randomize receive regimen either high low dose oxytocin . The expected outcome decrease caesarean section rate increase rate spontaneous vaginal delivery woman high dose oxytocin augmentation , without affect neonatal outcome childbirth experience negatively . Primary outcome caesarean delivery rate . Secondary outcome Apgar score < 7 5 minute , need neonatal intensive care , hyper-stimulation contraction , spontaneous vaginal birth rate , length labour , postpartum haemorrhage , sphincter laceration , experience labour pain , epidural analgesia women´s childbirth experience one month postpartum ( assessed Childbirth Experience Questionnaire ) . Based sample size calculation ( α=0.05 , β=0.80 ) , 688 woman need group . Analysis perform intention treat . Study result contribute establish good evidence-based routine regard oxytocin treatment delay labour progress .
DOC.criteria: Healthy nulliparous woman singleton pregnancy normal pregnancy cephalic presentation spontaneous onset active labour term ( 37 42weeks gestation ) delay arrest active labour NonSwedish speaking woman previous uterine surgery intrauterine growth retardation > 22 % malpresentation time inclusion intrapartal hemorrhage time inclusion nonreassuring fetalheart pattern time inclusion meconium time inclusion
